scripts-descriptions.lint: Run PHPCBF then PHPCS on PHP files before commit.
scripts-descriptions.build: Generate the optimized composer autoloader files and run PHP-Scoper on the vendor folder.
scripts-descriptions.release: Bump version, run build, generate readme.txt and make-pot. Usage: composer release <version>
scripts-descriptions.bob: Run appfromlab/bob commands. Usage: composer bob <command> [options]
